name: arch::mm::tlb_flush_addr_range

arch::mm::tlb_flush_addr.doc:
Flush any TLB entry that contains the map of the given virtual address.

 This flush performs regardless of the global-page bit. So it can flush both global
 and non-global entries.

core::option::Option: Unknown([Downcast(VariantIdx(1, ThreadLocalIndex)), Field(0, Ty { id: 11, kind: RigidTy(Uint(Usize)) })])

doc: Flush any TLB entry that intersects with the given address range.
